text: Annual Tree Mallow is a flowering plant. The genus Lavatera includes annuals and perennials. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.malvaceae.info/Genera/Malva/treemallow.php?1 *Jennifer Tate et al. 2005; Phylogenetic relationships within the tribe Malveae (Malvaceae, subfamily Malvoideae) as inferred from ITS sequence data. American Journal of Botany. 92:584-602 Category:Malvaceae
title: Annual Tree Mallow
